data.actual_result: “Message channel” message appears before the typing indicator is moved back fully to the left, causing the typing indicator to appear in the message
data.expected_result: “Message channel” doesn’t appear until the text is fully deleted
data.short_description: “Message channel” appears before text is fully deleted and typing indicator flashes in the message when deleting text (happens for a split second and is easier to see on poor connection)
data.steps_to_repro: - Type some text in a channel (I find it works better with a long continuous string of text) - Delete the text you’ve typed, making sure to hold the backspace button - Observe the left side of the message bar as the typing indicator deletes the last of the text - If you don’t notice it, watch closely and try again (you can also take a screen recording and go through frame by frame to see it if testing on good connection) - If testing on poor connection it also works with deleting the text character by character depending on how poor your connection is
